channel.title: How to add player has logged in to Matrix?
channel.description: I wanna add player has logged in. How do I add that to matrix? please help

item.title: How to add player has logged in to Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @Inception-X Inception-X
item.description:
@Inception-X wrote:

Easy,

if (getRights() == 2) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Administrator " + getUsername() + " Has Logged In."); } }

or for donator, it is like, if (player.isDonator)
and moderator is, if (getRights() ==1)
and so on.

<img=1> is the admin crown image,

IF you want a specific playername, do thisâ€¦

if (this.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("INPUT NAME HERE")) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("RANK"+ "NAME" + " Has Logged In."); continue; } }

You just simply add this code into Player.java

Read full topic
